intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using Real Time Chat.

collection.title: Information We Collect
items: Profile information: avatar, status, optional personal details
Message data: message content, attachments, timestamps
Device information: IP address, browser, operating system
Usage data: login frequency, app interactions

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We use SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission. Passwords are hashed using bcrypt. Data is stored on secure servers with strict access controls.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. Information is only shared when:
items: Required by law or government regulations
Protecting our rights and safety or others'

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access and download your personal data
File complaints with data protection authorities

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data while your account is active. After account deletion, data will be permanently deleted within 30 days, unless required by law to retain longer.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about this policy, please contact: privacy@realtimechat.com

intro.title: What Are Cookies?
intro.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember information about your visit.

essential.name: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function. Include authentication, session, and security cookies.

functional.name: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences and settings to improve experience.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how users interact with the application.

advertising.name: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: We currently do not use advertising or third-party tracking cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services like Google Analytics. These parties may set their own cookies. Please refer to their privacy policies for more information.

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.description: Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. Check your browser's help menu.

settings.title: App Settings
settings.description: You can manage cookie preferences in your account settings.

duration.title: Storage Duration
duration.session: Session cookies: Deleted when browser closes
duration.persistent: Persistent cookies: Stored for 30 days to 1 year depending on type

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this cookie policy. Significant changes will be notified via email or in-app notification.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Real Time Chat, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the service.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: Real Time Chat provides an online messaging platform that allows users to:
items: Send and receive text messages, images, files

responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
items: Responsible for all activities under your account

restrictions.title: Restrictions
items: Must be 13 years or older to use the service

prohibited.title: Prohibited Behaviors
items: Sending illegal, threatening, harassing, or abusive content
Interfering with or disrupting the service
Using unauthorized bots or automated tools

consequences.title: Consequences of Violations
consequences.content: Violations may result in warnings, temporary suspension, or permanent account deletion without prior notice.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.content: You retain ownership of content you post. However, you grant us a non-exclusive license to store and display that content to provide the service.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.content: You are solely responsible for the content you share. Ensure you have the right to share it and that it does not violate any rights of others.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The service and all its content, features, functionality (including but not limited to information, software, text, logos, graphics) are the property of Real Time Chat and protected by international copyright laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.byUser: You can delete your account at any time in settings.
termination.byUs: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms or for any other reason.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The service is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We are not liable for any loss or damage arising from use of the service.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Real Time Chat shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified via email or in-app notification. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact: legal@realtimechat.com
